Address.description: A structure representing the billing address of a card

CardDetails.description: A structure representing the payment card

card_type.description: The card type, `debit` or `credit` or `null` if not able to determine

expiry_date.description: The expiry date of the card in MM/yy format

language.description: ISO-639-1 Alpha-2 code of a supported language to use on the payment pages

metadata.description: Additional metadata - up to 10 name/value pairs - on the payment. Each key must be between 1 and 30 characters long. The value, if a string, must be no greater than 50 characters long. Other permissible value types: boolean, number.

moto.description: Mail Order / Telephone Order (MOTO) payment flag

_links.description: API endpoints related to the payment.

created_date.description: The date you created the payment.

description.description: The human-readable description you gave the payment.

email.description: The email address of your user.

moto.description: Mail Order / Telephone Order (MOTO) payment flag.

payment_id.description: The unique identifier of the payment.

provider_id.description: The reference number the payment gateway associated with the payment.

reference.description: The reference number you associated with this payment.

return_url.description: An HTTPS URL on your site that your user will be sent back to once they have completed their payment attempt on GOV.UK Pay.

fee.description: processing fee taken by the GOV.UK Pay platform, in pence. Only available depending on payment service provider

moto.description: Mail Order / Telephone Order (MOTO) payment flag

net_amount.description: amount including all surcharges and less all fees, in pence. Only available depending on payment service provider
